name: Mission Of Musashi-Demo
description:
Mission of Musashi

Currently, there are 2 big gangs that have been split up for a long time. The Black Dragon and the White Dragon Because they want to seize the trading area until the White Dragon Gang plans to kidnap the beloved daughter of the Black Dragon Chief to occupy all trading areas by himself.

Until the daughter of the leader of the Black Dragon Gang disappeared. The people of the Black Dragon Gang helped each other out to find them. But the leader of the Black Dragon Gang was not found. So I thought that it must be the plan of the White Dragon Gang. He offered to let anyone who could help his daughter ask him for one thing. But no one dared to lend a hand to help, but one person dared to offer himself, that was Musashi.

How To Play

Move - A D or Arrow

Jump - W or Spacebar

Attack - Left Click

Dash - Shift

Team

Sunny - Code

Ohm - Game Design

Runny - Art + Sound

Per - Art

Peem - Game Generalist
